headline: Trump’s Evil Is Contagious
abstract: The president has shown us exactly what happens when good people do nothing.
lead_paragraph: It passed with the usual shrug by the usual handmaidens of hatred when the president of the world’s most powerful democracy threatened to commit war crimes by bombing Iranian cultural sites — the kind of barbarism practiced by the Taliban and rogue-state thugs.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
